name: The Museum Of Germs!
description:
Welcome to the Museum of Germs! Help out the Germ Man and learn a few facts about different kinds of germs!

Mobile Play : Press the run game button and swipe in the direction you'd like to move and interact with things!

Desktop: Use your arrow keys to interact with things!

Music Credits : Louie Zhong - Charlie Brown's Day Off

Created by Project Pediatrics !
